attributes.action: Ban the creation of ALL non-recyclable plastic; create a law to impose the ban.
attributes.additional_details:
A new law should be created to prevent the creation of non-recyclable plastics. All newly created products should be created from recycled plastic.

Unless we take a stand against the production of products that contribute to the demise of this planet we will be responsible for the continuation of Global Warming and the ensuing disasters that occur as a result.
attributes.background:
There is absolutely no reason why we should continue to make non-recyclable packaging and it should be declared unlawful.

We have to make a step-change in the way we approach consumerism and the environment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586547
